hackathon-description-text: Hoya Hacks is Georgetown's premier hackathon. We are gathering 300 talented students for 36-hours this winter to build and innovate in both software and hardware, as part of a larger technological revolution at Georgetown.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Beeck Center for Impact and Innovation

hackathon-requirements: A link to a github is required.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For each member of the team:
For each member of the team:

HoyasForShe and senior administrators in the University will follow up with your team to provide assistance in moving your idea forward, developing a business plan, and promoting your idea. Depending on the feasibility, tech resources may be available to help develop your winning idea.
1. A heart shaped trophy with a little placard indicating winning the track.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Health Hack (American College of Cardiology)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: One part-time course worth ~$4K to the winning team + $50 class credit to each member of the team
Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment. Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Win a HackHarassment Swag Bag.

Everything is part of the internet of things now - from your phone to your fitness band to your thermostat. Build a hack that utilizes private data being collected from your devices, and show how you can turn potential vulnerabilities into something constructive. Prize: Collector's Edition of Watch Dogs 2
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Watch Dogs® 2 Best Device Privacy Hack
Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS
Best App or Program using Internet Sourced Data (BookHolders)

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: T-shirts and meetings with venture capitalists.
For each team member: Anker Portable Wireless Speakers, Godiva Chocolates

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=3700 O St NW, Washington, DC 20057, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: To what extent does this project solve a real problem?
How challenging was this project to build?

hackathon-location-address: 3700 O St NW, Washington, DC 20057, USA
hackathon-description-header: Come hack at Georgetown University! 36 hours to learn, collaborate, code, and innovate with fellow hackers.
hackathon-location-description: Georgetown University - Healey Family Student Center
